source_text:
# Science
Photosynthesis is the process by which plants convert light energy into chemical energy.

source_summary.core_thesis_or_main_argument: Photosynthesis is the process by which plants convert light energy into chemical energy.
source_summary.inferred_purpose: To define photosynthesis and its basic function.
